title: New Mount Targon Lore is amazing!
body: THANK YOU STORY DEVELOPMENT TEAM/WHOEVER IS RESPONSIBLE FOR LORE! The conflict between Leona and Diana has always been one of my favourite lore interactions, and (IMHO) the new lore is so much better. I'm also absolutely pumped for where this is going to go. I firmly believe that the two new champions will be amazing (the missing 4th Aspect and whoever is causing trouble for everyone). Can't wait!
